title: Login is Back!
subtitle: Log in via UniClubs
text: Login works again! You can verify your ETH affiliation via SWITCH edu-ID or university email through UniClubs.

title: VVZ Extension
subtitle: CourseReview in VVZ
text: As switching between CourseReview and VVZ is tedious, we created this extension to make it easier. It shows the reviews for courses directly in VVZ.

title: Teaching Evaluation
subtitle: Those pesky mails you get after every exam
text: Have you ever wondered what LET does with your feedback? Apart from giving it to the lecturers, part of it can be accessed publicly. If you are curious about the results, you can find them by following the link below.

title: Contribute
subtitle: Get involved :)
text: If you have feature suggestions, found a bug, or want to contribute, don't hesitate to contact us. Or go to the project's GitHub repositories directly.
